name: codecept-typescript-example
description: Example project of codeceptjs with typescript.
author: Mikkel Kjeldsen <commonquail@gmail.com>

scripts.test:e2e:def: TS_NODE_PROJECT='./src/specs/e2e/tsconfig.json' codeceptjs def && sed '/\.helper/d ; s|\./.*\(pages\)|\1|' steps.d.ts > ./src/specs/e2e/typings/steps.d.ts && rm steps.d.ts
